Message.En:
Oh, the serious person from the temple-
Welcome to Eastern Zandora, a place of death and honor, desire and romance.
Message.Jp:
あら――
死と名誉、欲とロマンのザンドラ東部へようこそ
神殿付の真面目さん

Message.En:
My name is Nadia.
I am the Area Master of this area of Zoma.
Message.Jp:
私はナディア
このゾマ周辺のエリアマスターをしているの

Message.En: As you can see, this is a land filled with danger. And thus, it attracts strong individuals and makes those who are worthy shine even brighter-
Message.Jp:
見てのとおり、ここは危険に満ちた土地
だからこそ強い人を惹きつけ
そして相応しい者をより輝かせる――

Message.En: Or make them one of the wandering dead -
Message.Jp: もしくは、朽ちて彷徨う死者の１人にする――

Message.En:
How about you?
Come on, let's see you run around as much as you can.
Message.Jp:
貴方はどうかしらね？
さぁ、精一杯駆けまわって見せて

Message.En: I appreciate all of your assistance.
Message.Jp: 諸々のご協力感謝するわ

Message.En:
You are an interesting person, so I will add some color to the next support goods for you.
Therefore, please show me more of your various talents.
Message.Jp:
貴方は面白い人だから
次からの支援品に色をつけてあげるわね
だから、もっといろいろして見せて頂戴――

Message.En:
Hey. 
The debris in the "Odd Rock Valley" that leads to the forbidden zone of Zandora has been removed, making it passable. 
That's good news, but there are creepy enemies lurking along the way.
Message.Jp:
ねぇ。ザンドラ禁域へ続く《奇岩谷》の
ガレキが除去されて、通行可能になったわよ
それは良かったんだけど、道中に
気味の悪い魔物がはびこっているの

Message.En: I wonder why that area is said to be prone to the emergence of such enemies.
Message.Jp:
どうしてかしら
あの辺りは、そういった魔物が湧きやすい
らしくてね

Message.En:
It's unpleasant and not suitable for a romantic place.
Because it's an enemy —
Could you please clean it up if you see it?
Message.Jp:
不快だし、ロマンの地には似つかわしくない
魔物だし――
見かけたら掃除しておいてくれないかしら

Message.En: Adventure in Zandora, you seem to be getting used to it, don't you?
Message.Jp: ザンドラでの冒険、慣れてきたようね

Message.En: To make you shine even more, There's someone I want to introduce to you.
Message.Jp:
貴方にもっと輝いてもらうために
紹介したい人がいるの

Message.En: To the esteemed Job Master of the Warrior, Oliver, staying at Oswald's Shop.
Message.Jp:
《オズワルドの店》に滞在している大剣豪
《ウォリアー》のジョブマスター、オリバーよ

Message.En: Striking down and crushing everything with a mighty blow—
Message.Jp:
あらゆるものを薙ぎ払い
打ち砕く剛き一撃――

Message.En: I'm sure you'll be able to use that fighting style too!
Message.Jp:
きっと貴方なら、その戦い方も
使いこなせると思うわ

Message.En: Hehe, I feel sorry for Sonia, who's waiting her turn to become an apprentice.
Message.Jp:
――ふふ、弟子入りの順番待ちをしてる
ソーニャには悪いけどね

Message.En: If you want to achieve even more brilliance as a Warrior, meet me and see for yourself.
Message.Jp:
《ウォリアー》として
さらなる輝きを得たければ、会ってみて

Message.En:
I see. 
Have you ever been to the Temple of Purification: South Chamber on the shores of Lake Cera?
Message.Jp:
そうだわ
セラー湖の岸辺にある《禊の神殿　離殿》は
通ったことがあるかしら？

Message.En: In that building, there is an underground passage, called the "Lakebottom Connecting Passage," which connects the bottom of Lake Cera like a canal.
Message.Jp:
あの建物には地下があってね――
《湖底連絡路》という、セラー湖の底を
巡るように繋がれた水路よ

Message.En:
Because so many people get lost when they go exploring, we've had it blocked off.
But there might be unique enemies and treasures that are sleeping there— maybe.
Message.Jp:
あまりに広く、探索にいって迷う人が
多いから封鎖していたのだけれど
もしかしたら変わった魔物や財宝が
眠ってる――かもしれないわね

Message.En:
I will make sure to leave the entrance open for you.
Feel free to come in if you're interested―― hehe
Message.Jp:
入り口、入れるようにしておくわ
興味があったらご自由にどうぞ――ふふ

Message.En:
You're doing great!
I often hear rumors about you at the Tavern.
Message.Jp:
すごい活躍ね
酒場でも貴方の噂をよく耳にするわ

Message.En: Is it thanks to you that this place has become lively?
Message.Jp:
ここが活気づいてきたのも
貴方のお陰かしら

Message.En:
I'll add some color to your support items.
Keep up the good work.
Message.Jp:
支援品に色をつけてあげるわ
これからも頼むわね

Message.En: Yes, I'm a little concerned about something and I'd like to count on your help.
Message.Jp:
そうだわ、ちょっと気になることがあってね
貴方の力をあてにさせてもらいたいの

Message.En: "East Zandora Ruins" - As I approached the ancient city on top of the hill, a Golem clad in flames appeared.
Message.Jp:
《東ザンドラ廃墟群》――
丘を少し登った遺跡街に
炎を纏ったゴーレムが現れたの

Message.En:
I wonder why it suddenly appeared. 
Did someone activate the power device that was in the ruins, perhaps?
Message.Jp:
突然どうして現れたのかしら
誰かが遺跡にあった起動装置を
動かしでもしたのかしら

Message.En:
And so, it seems that the Golem is showing signs of heading towards Zoma. 
How scary... hehe
Message.Jp:
で、そのゴーレムがどうもゾマの方へ
向かうそぶりを見せているらしいのよ
怖いわね――ふふ

Message.En:
So please do something about it.
It's a formal request.
Message.Jp:
というわけで、何とかしてくれないかしら
正式なお願いよ

Message.En: Hey, speaking of which, do you know about the Zandora Lighthouse located to the north of this area?
Message.Jp:
ねぇ、そういえば
この地の北にある《ザンドラ灯台》のことは
知ってる？

Message.En: It seems like the faction of Barbarians has started keeping magical beasts at the lighthouse.
Message.Jp:
灯台で、バルバロイの一派が魔獣を
飼いはじめたようなの

Message.En: According to rumors, it seems to be an enemy with a crest and large black wings.
Message.Jp:
噂によれば、トサカと大きな黒い翼を
持つ魔物らしいわ

Message.En: While I'm at the lighthouse or in the ruins, it's fine, but it would be troublesome if those barbarians come to Zoma.
Message.Jp:
灯台や廃墟群にいる間はいいけれど
野蛮なバルバロイ達がゾマにきたら厄介だわ

Message.En:
Is there anyone strong-
Who could do something, I wonder?
Hey-?
Message.Jp:
誰か強い人が――
何とかしてくれないかしら
ねぇ――？

Message.En:
You're really something, aren't you?
In the rough Zoma where there are only thugs, I have never seen anyone as skilled as you in both exploration and battle.
Message.Jp:
本当に大したものだわ
荒くれ者ばかりのゾマで
貴方ほど探索と戦いの両方に長けた人は
見たことがない

Message.En:
I am happy to have met you, although it feels presumptuous to talk about rewards.
From now on, I will provide you with special support that is different from anyone else's.
Message.Jp:
貴方と知り合えて、嬉しく思うわ
報酬というのもおこがましいけれど
これからは他の人とは違う、特別な支援を
してあげる――

Message.En:
I myself am also drawn to it, it seems.
Hehe...
Message.Jp:
私自身も惹かれてしまいそうね
ふふ――

Message.En:
Hey—
At the back of Zoma, on a hill called the Hill of the Dead, There is a place called the "Garden of Curses."
Message.Jp:
ねぇ――
死者の丘、ゾマの裏手に広がる
高台に《呪詛の庭》と呼ばれる場所があるの

Message.En:
In the garden that adjoins the "Shrine of Emptiness",
Trees hung with mysterious "seeds" that absorb the grudges of people and the souls of the deceased flourish.
Message.Jp:
人の恨みと死者の魂を吸い
得体の知れぬ"実"をぶらさげた木々が
茂る、《虚ろの祠》に接した庭よ

Message.En: So you know, the people who went to desecrate the shrine the other day were all killed.
Message.Jp:
そこでね、先日祠に盗掘にいった人達が
皆殺しにされたの

Message.En:
I wonder what took their lives--
Don't you think it's curious?
Message.Jp:
何が彼らの命を奪ったのかしらね――
気になると思わない？

Message.En: Perhaps it's about time I properly request something from you.
Message.Jp:
そろそろあなたに
きちんと依頼を出してみようかしら

Message.En:
I'm asking you to help me solve the greatest mystery of the Hill of the Dead--
"The Ghost Knight and the Cursed Treasure".
Message.Jp:
私が頼みたいのは
死者の丘、最大の謎――
"亡霊騎士と呪いの秘宝"の解明なの

Message.En: It is said that the secret treasure is located in the underground of Zandora Chapel, spread out in the Dead Lord's Labyrinth.
Message.Jp:
その秘宝があると言われているのは
ザンドラ礼拝堂の地下に広がる
《死王の迷宮》よ

Message.En: --I want to know what's behind it
Message.Jp:
――私はその奥に何があるのか
知りたいの

Message.En: Perhaps, it was for the sake of waiting for someone like you here that I became an Area Master.
Message.Jp:
そのためだけに
ここで貴方のような人を待ちながら
エリアマスターをしてきたのかも――

Message.En:
But that's a dangerous place, no joke.
I'll leave it up to you to decide if you want to take on the challenge.
Message.Jp:
でも、あそこは冗談抜きで危険な場所
挑むかどうかは貴方に委ねるわ

Message.En:
You're really something, aren't you?
In the rough Zoma where there are only thugs, I have never seen anyone as skilled as you in both exploration and battle.
Message.Jp:
本当に大したものだわ
荒くれ者ばかりのゾマで、貴方ほど
探索と戦いの両方に長けた人は見たことがない

Message.En:
I am happy to have met you, although it feels presumptuous to talk about rewards. 
From now on, I will provide you with special support that is different from anyone else's.
Message.Jp:
貴方と知り合えて、嬉しく思うわ
報酬というのもおこがましいけれど
これを持って行って

Message.En:
I myself am also drawn to it, it seems.
Hehe...
Message.Jp:
――ん、私自身も惹かれてしまいそう
ふふ――

Message.En: I often hear rumors about your great achievements. Your fame reaches even the Tavern.
Message.Jp:
すごい活躍だそうね
酒場でも貴方の噂をよく耳にするわ

Message.En:
Is it thanks to you that this place has become lively, I wonder? 
Yes, this is a gift for your recent work. 
I will rely on you again.
Message.Jp:
ここが活気づいてきたのも貴方のお陰かしら
はい、このところの働きへの贈り物よ
また頼むわね

Message.En:
Thanks for all your help.
Yes, take this.
My gift to you on behalf of Zoma.
Message.Jp:
諸々のご協力感謝するわ
はい、これを受け取って
ゾマを代表して私から、あなたへの贈り物よ

Message.En:
A reliable person is wonderful, isn't it? 
For always treating me well, I offer this to you.
Message.Jp:
――逞しい人って、素敵
いつも良くしてくれるあなたには
これを進呈するわ

Message.En: This is just for you— It's a secret from the others.
Message.Jp:
あなたにだけ特別よ――
他の連中には内緒ね

Message.En: Any time, I'll be waiting, hehe...
Message.Jp: いつでも待っているわ、ふふ――

Message.En:
Yes, this time's support goods.
I thought regular goods wouldn't be enough for you, so I upgraded them a bit.
Message.Jp:
はい、今回の支援品よ
貴方には粗品じゃ物足りないだろうと思って
少しグレードを上げてみたわ

Message.En: Please make use of it.
Message.Jp: 役に立てて頂戴

Message.En: Today is the day of support for adventurers. Here, please take this as a treat and use it.
Message.Jp:
ちょうど今日は、探索者の支援日なの
これ、差し入れよ、使ってちょうだい

Message.En:
Welcome to Zoma.
Is there something you wish to discuss?
Message.Jp:
ゾマにようこそ
何か相談事かしら

Message.En:
Hehe...
I like seeing the people gathered here.
Message.Jp:
ふふ――
私はここに集う人達を見るのが好き

Message.En: Don't you think people who are intoxicated by such vague things like ambition, dreams, romance, and tests of strength are adorable?
Message.Jp:
野望とか夢とか、ロマンとか力試しとか
そんな漠然としたモノに酔ってる人達って
可愛いと思わない？

Message.En:
I want to convey a fragment of a chance to as many people as possible.
Because stories like that gather here.
Message.Jp:
チャンスの一欠片を、少しでも多くの人に
伝えてあげたいの
ここには、そういう話が集まるから

Message.En:
I want Zoma to become more glamorous and dangerous.
And thus, attract dazzling people.
Message.Jp:
ゾマにはもっと華やかに、より危険に
なってもらいたいわ
そして、ぎらぎらした人を呼び込むの

Message.En: Because among such people, there might be someone who can truly reach the lost golden paradise.
Message.Jp:
そういう人の中から、失われた黄金郷へ
真に辿りつける人が出るかもしれないから

Message.En: And thus, even in the depths of a profound labyrinth...
Message.Jp: そして、深い迷宮の奥にもね――

Message.En:
There's a "Sub Portcrystal".
 It seems like everything around here can be used now. 
Just a moment ago, a messenger from the temple said so.
Message.Jp:
《辺境の礎》ってあるわよね
この辺りにあるソレが全て使えるようになったそうよ
ついさっき、神殿からの使いがそう言っていたわ

Message.En:
I've heard it's great to get to places that were inconvenient in an instant, but--
it's kind of tacky.
Message.Jp:
不便だったところへも一瞬で移動できる
優れものだと聞いたけど――
何だか無粋だわ

Message.En:
You know, if you've come to Eastern Zandora, I'd like you to move on your own. 
I don't want you to miss the scattered fragments of romance that lie in this wild land—
Message.Jp:
私はね、ザンドラ東部に来たのなら自分の足で
移動してほしいと思ってるのよ
この荒れ地に転がる数々のロマンの欠片を
見落としてほしくないもの――

Message.En: Hey... Lately, it seems like there's a big armor causing trouble somewhere east from here...
Message.Jp:
ねぇ――最近、ここから東の方で
大きな鎧が暴れているらしいのよ――

Message.En:
The armor, 
likely manipulated by some kind of magic, 
has come to that place guided by the stench 
of death that permeates it.
Message.Jp:
きっと何らかの魔力で操られた鎧が
あの場所に染みついた死臭に導かれて
やって来たのね

Message.En:
Hehe, not unusual around here...
That area gathers corpses of human
and beast alike - known as the
"Weeping Corpse Ground."
Message.Jp:
ふふ、この辺りでは珍しいことじゃないわ――
特にあそこは人獣問わず死体が多くて
《屍のすすり泣く地》なんて呼ばれているんですもの

Message.En:
But I'm concerned that the range of armor wandering around seems to be getting wider and wider.
If it gets to this Zoma...
Message.Jp:
だけど、鎧のうろつく範囲が
段々拡がってきているらしいのが気がかりなの
このゾマにまでやってきたら――

Message.En:
If the town that supports the adventurers collapses, it will be a disaster.
I wonder if someone reliable could go and subdue it, I wonder...
Hey?
Message.Jp:
探求者たちを支える町が潰えては、大変
頼もしい誰かが討伐に行ってくれないかしら――
ねぇ？

Message.En:
So then, do you already know about the Mysterious Mausoleum?
What kind of place is it?
Catacombs――yes, an underground graveyard.
Message.Jp:
そうね、《幽玄の霊堂》のことはもう知っていて？
どんな場所かって？
カタコンベ――そう、地下墓地よ

Message.En:
Originally, it was a historic mausoleum, they say.
But now, it seems that the deceased who cannot find rest continue to wander.
Message.Jp:
元は歴史ある霊堂だったそうよ
けど、今は眠りにつくことができない死者たちが
彷徨い続けているんだとか――

Message.En: I wonder if the deceased were truly unable to rest in peace, or if their homeland, Zandora, becoming like this caused them to awaken from their slumber out of overwhelming regret.
Message.Jp:
死者たちは本当に眠りにつくことが
できなかったのかしら？
それとも故郷であるザンドラがこんなことになって
無念さのあまり眠りから覚めてしまったのかしら――

Message.En: Speaking of which, that guy hasn't come back yet--
Message.Jp:
そういえば
あの人たちまだ帰ってこないのよね――

Message.En: Hmmm, I'm talking about the young man who went to the other day to steal from the Mysterious Mausoleum.
Message.Jp:
ふふ、この前《幽玄の霊堂》に
意気揚々と盗掘に行った若者のことよ

Message.En: They were still young, but in their youthful recklessness, I wonder if they joined the dead.
Message.Jp:
まだ若い子たちだったんだけど
若さ故の無謀さで
死者の仲間入りをしちゃったのかしら

Message.En:
Oh, you... 
You have such an interested look on your face. 
I wonder if you're a really kind person?
Message.Jp:
あら、貴方――
気になるって顔してるわね
よっぽど人が良いのかしら？

Message.En: If you wish to go and see for yourself, please consult with me.
Message.Jp:
いいわ、もし様子を見に行きたいなら
私に相談して

Message.En:
Now, you are the greatest explorer and warrior in this Zoma. 
It might even be right to call an existence like you 'romance'.
Message.Jp:
今や貴方はこのゾマで
一番の探索者、そして戦士よ
貴方のような存在そのものがロマンと言っても
いいんじゃないかしら

Message.En:
I am glad to have met you.
I will upgrade the support goods even more, So please let me hear your story again.
Message.Jp:
貴方と知り合えて、嬉しく思うわ
支援品をうんと格上のものにするから
また話を聞かせてちょうだい

Message.En: Hmm, I wonder if I'm attracted to you. Hehe...
Message.Jp:
――ん、私ったら貴方に惹かれてるのかしら
ふふ――
